isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - HOOD, GRILLE, AND FENDERS - 5000i, 9000i - REMOVE - REMOVE FENDER EXTENSIONS

svcsubproc.title: Remove Fender Extensions on 9100 i (SBA) and 9200 i (SBA)
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 34 for all items in parentheses.

step1.para: With the hood tilted open, remove hex screw assembly fastener with special flat washer (Items 1 and 2) and hex nut, lock washer and flat washer (Items 3, 4 and 5) securing fender extension (Item 6) to the side of the cab mounting bracket (Item 7), driver side shown.
Remove two hex screw assembly fasteners (Item 8) attaching fender extension (Item 6) to the fender extension weld nut mounting bracket (Item 9) under the side of the cab (Item 10), driver side shown.

Remove three hex screw assembly fasteners with flat washers (Items 11 and 12) attaching fender extension (Item 6) to the under side of the cab (Item 10) and remove fender extension, driver side shown.
Repeat this procedure to remove passenger side fender extension.

figure.caption: Figure 34. Remove Fender Extension on 9100 i (SBA) and 9200 i (SBA)

calloutgroup.callout1: 9. FENDER EXTENSION WELD NUT MOUNTING BRACKET

svcsubproc.title: Remove Fender Extensions on 9400 i (SBA)
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 35 for all items in parentheses.

step1.para: With the hood tilted open, remove hex screw assembly fastener with special flat washer (Items 1 and 2) and hex nut, lock washer and flat washer (Items 3, 4 and 5) securing fender extension (Item 6) to the side of the cab mounting bracket (Item 7), driver side shown.
Remove two hex screw assembly fasteners (Item 8) attaching fender extension (Item 6) to the fender extension weld nut mounting bracket (Item 9) under the side of the cab (Item 10), driver side shown.

Remove three hex screw assembly fasteners with flat washers (Items 11 and 12) attaching fender extension (Item 6) to the under side of the cab (Item 10) and remove fender extension, driver side shown.
Repeat this procedure to remove passenger side fender extension.

figure.caption: Figure 35. Remove Fender Extension on 9400 i (SBA)

calloutgroup.callout1: 9. FENDER EXTENSION WELD NUT MOUNTING BRACKET

svcsubproc.title: Remove Fender Extensions on 5600 i (SBA) with Tilt Hood
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 36 for all items in parentheses.

step1.para: With the hood tilted open, remove two hex bolts with flat washers (Items 1 and 2) and two hex nuts, lock washers and flat washers (Items 3, 4 and 5) securing fender extension (Item 6) to the top of the fender extension mounting bracket (Item 7) on the side of the cab (Item 8), driver side shown.

Remove hex bolt with lock washer and two flat washers (Items 9, 10 and 11) attaching fender extension (Item 6) to the fender extension weld nut mounting bracket (Item 12) under the side of the cab (Item 8), driver side shown.
Repeat this procedure to remove passenger side fender extension.

figure.caption: Figure 36. Remove Fender Extension on 5600 i (SBA) with Tilt Hood

calloutgroup.callout1: 12. FENDER EXTENSION WELD NUT MOUNTING BRACKET

svcsubproc.title: Remove Rubber Fender Extensions on 5500 i (SFA)
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 37 for all items in parentheses.

step1.para: With the hood closed, remove twelve hex bolts with nylon retainer washers (Items 1 and 2) and twelve hex nuts, lock washers and flat washers (Items 3, 4 and 5) securing rubber fender extension (Item 6) to the outside of the hood assembly (Item 7) and remove rubber fender extension, driver side shown.
Repeat this procedure to remove passenger side rubber fender extension.

figure.caption: Figure 37. Remove Rubber Fender Extension on 5500 i (SFA)

svcsubproc.title: Remove Rubber Fender Extensions on 5900 i (SFA)

figure.caption: Figure 38. Remove Rubber Fender Extension on 5900 i (SFA)

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 38 for all items in parentheses.

step1.para: With the hood tilted open, remove eleven hex bolts with nylon retainer washers (Items 1 and 2) and eleven hex nuts, lock washers and flat washers (Items 3, 4 and 5) securing rubber fender extension (Item 6) to the outside of the hood assembly (Item 7) and remove rubber fender extension, driver side shown.
Repeat this procedure to remove passenger side rubber fender extension.
